channel.title: The Wait Is Over! Orion 5th March
channel.description:
Orion is finally here, With a lot of people waiting on Release date, We are now announcing that Orion will be live and ready to play on March 5th 2015.
What Is Orion? -
-Orion is a Development project with 2 year's of coding - Every single Skill works 100% -Grand Exchange works 100% -Economy Prices and Player owned Shops - Every boss added 100% - All latest items, very few customs, (We did not want to ruin the design..) - Custom client/Tags/Donator Benefits/Zone - Fully working website with forums - All spells/Hybrid/Prayers, perfect Pking/Switching - 5 Worlds - Voting system - Prestige Ranks with Shop, (Get all 99's / Prestige - Reset all skills = Prestige 1 = Opens up a Shop, x1 / x2/ x3 - Completely customized dungeoneering system and Item only purchase shop's - Auto macroing detector added, Minigames and all emotes
SO MUCH MORE but you will just have to wait... Below is a video of the test Server, This is not the actual game server so thing's are very different so dont judge.. The Release server no-body has seen but the Developers, This is the big secret which we have been holding back for the past 2 year's.. Be sure to stay on this Post..
When you log in, your not going to no what your in for.. Soulsplit & Ikov, We wish you Goodluck.
WATCH BOTH VIDS
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sDEg6ogZw2s&feature=youtu.be
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UA1g3iriWeI

item.title: The Wait Is Over! Orion 5th March
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Decent videos but not everyone is going to watch them as most are looking for a server quickly so they mostly look at pictures (at least in my experience).

Read full topic
item.source: The Wait Is Over! Orion 5th March

item.title: The Wait Is Over! Orion 5th March
item.dc:creator: @Sunshy Sunshy
item.description:
@Sunshy wrote:

Orion is finally here, With a lot of people waiting on Release date, We are now announcing that Orion will be live and ready to play on March 5th 2015.

What Is Orion? -

-Orion is a Development project with 2 year’s of coding

  • Every single Skill works 100%
    -Grand Exchange works 100%
    -Economy Prices and Player owned Shops
  • Every boss added 100%
  • All latest items, very few customs, (We did not want to ruin the design…)
  • Custom client/Tags/Donator Benefits/Zone
  • Fully working website with forums
  • All spells/Hybrid/Prayers, perfect Pking/Switching
  • 5 Worlds
  • Voting system
  • Prestige Ranks with Shop, (Get all 99’s / Prestige - Reset all skills = Prestige 1 = Opens up a Shop, x1 / x2/ x3
  • Completely customized dungeoneering system and Item only purchase shop’s
  • Auto macroing detector added, Minigames and all emotes

SO MUCH MORE but you will just have to wait…
Below is a video of the test Server, This is not the actual game server so thing’s are very different so dont judge… The Release server no-body has seen but the Developers, This is the big secret which we have been holding back for the past 2 year’s… Be sure to stay on this Post…

When you log in, your not going to no what your in for… Soulsplit & Ikov, We wish you Goodluck.

WATCH BOTH VIDS

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sDEg6ogZw2s&feature=youtu.be

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UA1g3iriWeI

Read full topic
item.source: The Wait Is Over! Orion 5th March
